data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This article is one of the worst articles on Wikipedia. With ____ encyclopedic ____, ____ also ____ very ____ photos. It ____ that Human Females ____ 2X ____ in ____ than ____. Please put a proper, dictionary like photo (Drawings are more appropriate since the artist can create two perfectly average men ad women).
data.partBlankContent: This article is one of the worst articles on Wikipedia. With l__ encyclopedic va___, i_ also h__ very misle_____ photos. It app____ that Human Females a__ 2X big___ in si__ than ma___. Please put a proper, dictionary like photo (Drawings are more appropriate since the artist can create two perfectly average men ad women).
data.answer: 这篇文章是维基百科上最差的文章之一。它的百科全书价值很低，但也有非常误导人的照片。人类女性的体型似乎比男性大2倍。请放一个合适的，字典一样的照片(绘图更合适，因为艺术家可以创造两个完全平均的男人和女人)。
